results.title: General practitioners' views and experiences of over-the-counter simvastatin in Scotland.
results.text_hl: The majority (92.6%, 428) were aware that community pharmacists could sell @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ to reduce the risk of a first @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003323 @@@coronary@@@ event in individuals at moderate risk of CHD.

citations.NLM: Stewart D, Cunningham IT, Hansford D, John D, McCaig D, McLay J. General practitioners' views and experiences of over-the-counter simvastatin in Scotland. Br J Clin Pharmacol. 2010 Sep;70(3):356-9. PMID: 20716235

results.title: Simvastatin for secondary prevention of all-cause mortality and major coronary events in patients with mild chronic renal insufficiency.
results.text_hl: Rates of major @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003323 @@@coronary@@@ events (adjusted HR, 0.67; CI, 0.56 to 0.79) and @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003323 @@@coronary@@@ revascularization (adjusted HR, 0.62; CI, 0.49 to 0.77) also were significantly lower in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group.

citations.NLM: Chonchol M, Cook T, Kjekshus J, Pedersen TR, Lindenfeld J. Simvastatin for secondary prevention of all-cause mortality and major coronary events in patients with mild chronic renal insufficiency. Am J Kidney Dis. 2007 Mar;49(3):373-82. PMID: 17336698

results.title: Pharmacists' perceived integration into practice of over-the-counter simvastatin five years post reclassification.
results.text_hl: ...BACKGROUND: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ 10 mg was reclassified in 2004 to over-the-counter (OTC) status in the UK, indicated for the prevention of a first major @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003323 @@@coronary event@@@ in individuals at moderate risk of the event.

results.title: The VYtorin on Carotid intima-media thickness and overall arterial rigidity (VYCTOR) study.
results.text_hl: Ninety high-risk @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003323 @@@coronary@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ were allocated to 3 groups: @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@ 40 mg, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 40 mg, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 20 mg and @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@ 10 mg initially.

citations.NLM: Meaney A, Ceballos G, Asbun J, Solache G, Mendoza E, Vela A, Meaney E. The VYtorin on Carotid intima-media thickness and overall arterial rigidity (VYCTOR) study. J Clin Pharmacol. 2009 Jul;49(7):838-47. PMID: 19443679
